snippet: President Obama needs to mount a surge of humanitarian care to handle the explosion of young migrants fleeing violence in their home countries.
abstract: Editorial calls on Obama administration to roll out wave of humanitarian assistance for thousands of unaccompanied minors crossing the southwest border, saying Congress should approve $1.4 billion in emergency spending for crisis; notes that children, fleeing violence in their home countries, have been subject to deplorable conditions, lacking food, medical care and adequate shelter; argues that long term solution involves opening more legitimate routes to legal immigration.
lead_paragraph: President Obama needs to mount a surge of humanitarian care to handle the explosion of young migrants fleeing violence in their home countries.

headline.seo: Immigrant Children Need Safety, Shelter and Lawyers
